titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

Renewed Sept 30 1931 - Sept 30 1932 1931 since 1930 balance 74 new subsc 157.50 231.50 paid Oct 14 150 balance due 81 50 sent bill Nov 5 Oct 14 Collected Poems A E Nov 19 Candle of Vision Nov 19 Interpretors Nov 19 National Being Nov 19 Dublin Magazine autumn 1931 0.25 Oct 21 Nov 19 instead of subscribing for year - 3 mos
157 50 1 year 81 still owed. paid 76.50 balance owed for one year 65 changed to 3 mos 11.50 credit left for extras
subsc cancelled
all vols returned
